mapper.select: select * from ( select * from t_organization where name like '%'||#{keyWords}||'%' and isdeleted='0' order by create_time desc ) where 1=1
mapper.update: update t_organization set isdeleted='1' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_account where isdeleted='0' and logname= #{logName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from t_authority where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdeleted='1'
select a.* from t_role2authority ra ,t_authority a where ra.authorityid = a.id and a.isdeleted='0' and ra.roleid = #{roleId}
